meanings.definition: To exceed in promise or potential.
meanings.sent1: She always outpromises her friends by delivering more than she promises.
meanings.sent2: The new restaurant is outpromising all the others in town with its delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outpromised the big grasshopper by gathering more food for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun outpromises the darkness of the night, bringing hope and warmth.
meanings.sent5: His hard work and dedication outpromise any obstacles that come his way.

meanings.definition: To make a promise or commitment that exceeds others.
meanings.sent1: He tends to outpromise his colleagues by offering more than he can deliver.
meanings.sent2: The company is outpromising its competitors with their new product guarantees.
meanings.sent3: The magician outpromised the audience by promising to make an elephant disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile outpromises any words, showing her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The student's determination outpromises any doubts about his success.
